3: Kamui!
Kamui... Wake up! The floor's about to collapse!
Lu... cia...
Wait! Roland... Where is he? He just... I...
Roland already vanished before we broke through and found you... We just detected high Punishing Virus activity, what did he do to you?
I don't know... but I faded out back then... I don't feel anything strange though.
The infrastructure begins to fall apart as swarms of Corrupted crawl through the seams.
...Are you really okay? Though it is true that you currently show no signs of corruption.
If your corruption threshold goes over, Liv can detect it before you can even tell it yourself.
Everyone, the last withdrawal route is also blocked by Corrupted.
Corrupted will also evade the collapsed areas. This will only increase their density in our path.
If there's no path, then we'll just have to break through and make a path!
Even if we do manage to break through, we still won't know where to go.
Where to go... Lucia, that reminds me! I might have a plan!
Just say it, we don't have time...
Strike Hawks are professional scouts, so to gather intel, we always plant monitoring devices on our mission paths.
These devices collect high-precision geo-data of the surroundings. If they are still intact, then the mapping should be done by now.
Calculating a route from high precision geo-data mapping... Liv, is that doable?
Yes, if the data is precise enough, then with my computing power, it should be doable!
Alrighty, let's go retrieve the nearby devices then!
You just barely recovered from the fight with Roland, are you going to be okay?
No problem, ma'am! Just a mere scratch! It's so unlike you though, Lucia, caring about others, haha!
I... I didn't care about others before...?
